title: Transactions documentation does not talk about constraints for transaction log
body:
### Describe the bug

The page https://quarkus.io/version/2.7/guides/transaction#configuring-transaction-node-name-identifier does not describe the constraints for the transaction log. For example that is is expected to be able to fulfill properties for ACID transactions and be available to the transaction manager with the specific node identifier as long as is necessary.

### Expected behavior

Any constraints are documented

### Actual behavior

_No response_
